reviews.review:
Zajebista gierka no nic dodać nic ująć. 
A nie jednak jest dodać - WIĘCEJ FPS

ce jeux est mal fait, 

je voulais jouer avec mes amis mais a cause téléchargement inexistant est en plus de serveur avec des amis injoignable 

je n'ai  jamais pu m'amuser sur jeux car je voulais faire du ba_jail avec des amis et je n'ai pas pu très deçu 

ps: si qqun veut bien me donner de l'aide je ne suis pas contre ^^

I like this game better than CSGO, the gunplay and aesthetics of the game just makes me feel good playing it, makes me wish this game stuck around for a bit more, just to I could experience it in it's prime. The game suffers from lack of a "proper gameplay" if you know what I mean, there aren't many servers that offer you the vanilla experience of Source, at least not ones with an acceptable ping for me. These days I mainly play duels with a friend, it's fun most of the time.
physics are so much more fun to play with than in csgo
bei mir wechselt die map ständig ich blinke in einem 1 mm tackt kann nichts machen
The #1 online action in the world!
Gun games and old school maps are a blast, I suck but it's still a lot of fun.
经典永流传，而且画质好太多了。
Я что, один час стрелял просто??!?
Had a lot of fun with this game, when my brother in law introduced me to  it.
Good way to let pass some time
CSS - моя любимая из серии КС. Не могу сказать что она лучше всех, но все-таки лучше 1.6. Рекомендую
крутая игра мясилово в некаторых катках
CS:GO are played by Zoomers, Cringers and Ragers, CS 1.6 are played by Boomers, Cringe wannbe cool Zoomers and Ragers, but only CS:Source ale played by real Chads and Based Guys.
abi alın server fln kurun server yok boş boş botlarla oynuyom yaw
lets be honest, you got this for garry's mod materials.
I've spent two-decades playing this game. Wouldn't trade it for the world. The graphics may not be the best, but the game play is still outstanding and more than holds up against more modern rivals.
Даже на нышнее время эта игра осталась в моём сердце игра шикарная
cs go daga iyi ama cs go pc si kaldirmayanlar icin ideal bi oyun ama fiyat bakimindan biraz daga ucuz olabilirmiş öneririm farkli bi havasi var cs go ya gore
Топ игра! Даже нечего больше сказать
Идеальная игра для тех кто хочет отдохнуть
O Melhor CS até HJ já feito! Gráficos lindos e física impressionante, esse CS põe o CS GO pra M@M@R!! :)
Muito bom, uma pena eu ser ruim
Старая добрая сурса радует глаз по сей день. И поскольку (добротный и хорошо сделанный) anti-cheat не справляется с кс го, это отличный аналог. Рекомендую, для всех емае возрастов подходит

No wonder no one wanted to play this. Movement is so, OMFG, so bad. Volvo by killing bunny-hopping killed whole game. This is bad alone but mouse input is what makes it unplayable. This is the only FPP game where aiming feels wrong and this game is all about aiming. It's like having accaleration turned on or something.

Deag is cool in CSS tho. Too bad that aiming suck so hard. 

0/10
Der Nachfolger des Ego Klassikers. Auch knappe 20 Jahre nach Realease immernoch gut.

This game is what I've always wanted from a FPS game.
The best way to describe this game is someone took all the good parts of quake. chess, and Doom and then made this gem. If you like either one of those games and understand FPS games can be slow paced games. Followed with spikes of high action in each match. You will enjoy yourself for days to come.

Çok güzel bir oyun bence almalısınız kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.
Classic team shooter. If you love CS:GO, check out this class Counter Strike game.

---------[Oyun]---------
Adı: Counter-Strike: Source
Yapımcı: Valve
İnceleyen: Bluur

---------[Bu Oyun Kütüphanende Favorilerdemi?]---------
✅ Evet. / 🔲 Hayır.

---------[Sistem Gereksinimleri]---------
🔲 Gelişmiş Bir Bilgisayar.
🔲 Üst Düzey Bir Bilgisayar.
✅ İyi Bir Bilgisayar.
🔲 Ortalama Bir Bilgisayar.
🔲 Kötü Bir Bilgisayar.
🔲 Her Türlü Bilgisayar.

---------[Hikaye]---------
🔲 Hikaye Uyumlu Ve Çok İyiydi.
🔲 Güzel Akışa Uygun Bir Hikaye'ye Sahip.
🔲 Hikaye Biraz Kısaydı.
🔲 Sadece Ara Sahneler Var.
✅ Hikaye Yok.

---------[Kitle]---------
✅ Çocuk.
✅ Yetişkin.
🔲 Yaşlı.
🔲 Hepsi.

---------[Satın Almana Değdimi?]---------
🔲 Evet! İyiki Almışım.
✅ Mükemmel, Bu Oyunun Devamı Gelmeli.
🔲 İyi, Bir Oyun. Verdiğim Paraya Değdi.
🔲 Kötü, Almamalıymışım.
🔲 Hiç Görmeseydim Bu Oyunu.

---------[Dikkat Çekme Düzeyi]---------
🔲 + 15 Ya Da 13 [Harika]
🔲 + 13 Ya Da 10 [Güzel , Kaliteli]
✅ + 10 Ya Da 6 [İyi]
🔲 + 6 Ya Da 2 [Biraz Kötü]
🔲 + 2 Ya Da 0 [Berbat]

---------[Ek Olarak]---------
Kuratörlerin İncelemeleri Hangi Yönde? [ Olumlu / Olumsuz ]
✅ Olumlu / 🔲 Olumsuz

---------[Benim Puanım]---------
0/12'ye Kadar,

              [9/12] MSM Değerlerime Göre.
